redirectmanager-title: Title for the dialog window, and the tooltip for the button that opens the dialog.
redirectmanager-newredirect-field: Label for a text input field.
redirectmanager-newredirect-button: Button text for submitting the text input field.
redirectmanager-redirect-page-exists: Error message displayed when a redirect is submitted but its page already exists.
redirectmanager-no-target:
Error message displayed when the target of a redirect does not exist.

Parameters:

* $1 — The title of the requested target page.
redirectmanager-edit-summary: Change comment used when creating a new redirect page.
tag-redirectmanager: Name of the change tag with which edits are tagged.
tag-redirectmanager-description: Description of the change tag, viewed on [[Special:Tags]].
redirectmanager-existing-redirects:
Label text above a list of existing redirects.

Parameters:

*$1 — Title of the current page.
redirectmanager-no-redirects-found: Notice text shown below the above label when there are zero existing redirects.
redirectmanager-copy-to-clipboard: Button text for the copy-to-clipboard button.
redirectmanager-copied-to-clipboard: Button text for the copy-to-clipboard button, displayed after the button is clicked.
